    • Method Detail

      • createCollection

        public void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                             java.lang.String configName,
                             int numOfShards,
                             int numOfReplicas)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        1. Check if config set is already deployed on the solr server, if not: download from repo and upload to zK 2. Create collection 3. Check if dependencies (runtime-libs) are installed, if not download and install (and name it with group:artefact:version) 4. Add/Update collection runtime-libs
        Parameters:
        collectionName - String name of the collection to create.
        configName - should be either the name of an already defined configuration in the solr cloud or the full name of an artifact accessible in one of the default repositories.
        numOfShards - integer number of shards
        numOfReplicas - integer number of replicas
        Throws:
        {@link - IOException} thrown if is not possible to create the collection.
        java.io.IOException

      • collectionExists

        public boolean collectionExists(java.lang.String collectionName)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether a collection is already existing in the solr server.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - String name of the collection to check.
        Returns:
        true if the collection is already existing in the server false otherwise.
        Throws:
        {@link - IOException} is thrown when a problem with the solr request occurs.
        java.io.IOException

      • updateCollection

        public void updateCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                             java.lang.String configName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        1. Check if config set is already deployed on the solr server, if not: download from repo and upload to zK 2. Switch configuration 3. Check if dependencies (runtime-libs) are installed, if not download and install (and name it with group:artefact:version) 4. Add/Update collection runtime-libs
        Parameters:
        collectionName - String name of the collection to update.
        configName - should be either the name of an already defined configuration in the solr cloud or the full name of an artifact accessible in one of the default repositories.
        Throws:
        {@link - IOException} is thrown when a problem with the solr request occurs.
        java.io.IOException

        Adds or updates runtime dependency to a core
        Parameters:
        runtimeDependencies - Map of String dependency name and its Long version number.
        collectionName - String name of the collection to update.
